data.description:
Fantastic Opportunity in Cotswold!

This beautiful corner of desirable Cotswold is zoned N1-A, giving you the possibility to create a custom home or luxury duplex. Close to uptown, the lot is large with nearby shopping, restaurants and great schools, making it a great place to live.
The existing house on the lot is a tear down, so you'll have the opportunity to start fresh and build the home of your dreams.  Sellers will need to stay in the home for approx 60 days after closing,  giving you plenty of time to plan and permit your build. This is a great opportunity to own a piece of prime real estate in a very desirable neighborhood. House is not available for showing, and being sold “as is”,  with no known issues.  Also listed under MLS #4079729  Please do not enter or walk the property.  Contact the listing agent for more information.
